body:
First off, I don't feel like leading anymore or trying to, I expected the win as I did back on conquest thing tournament 5 o 4 , this team started like a normal team getting players that were mainly my friends I enjoyed playing conquest and this race to victory tournament, I am glad I got to know all the members, ginie1 was teh reason of us winning that guy is a fking legend? good run with everyone on the team old and new ones.
We are disbanding because neither me nor LFT want to lead, was a good oportunity to say good bye to everyone on avicus, I don't think I will be playing avicus more except if ginie creates Carthage here, good luck to every team and have fun playing tournaments.
Posighdun, n_e, juanno thanks to be in the team with me ;)
I'm doing this so everyone in HORIZON know why we are not doing more tournaments.

G_G

title: Horizon Disbanding

replies.body: Love you, excited to see what ginie and us can do for a Carthage :)
replies.body_tagged: Love you, excited to see what ginie and us can do for a Carthage :)

replies.body: One of the best times I've had playing competitive minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: One of the best times I've had playing competitive minecraft.

replies.body: :( Been fun dudes. Thanks Zicuri, rob, Paji, Juanno, Swagger, Mint and ne you op OG's.
replies.body_tagged: :( Been fun dudes. Thanks Zicuri, rob, Paji, Juanno, Swagger, Mint and ne you op OG's.

replies.body: pasa el autoclicker antes que te vayas aunque sea :/
replies.body_tagged: pasa el autoclicker antes que te vayas aunque sea :/

replies.body: Wow that is a lot of teams disbanding.  2 within 2 hours of one another.  Did this last tournament make a lot of teams upset?  Understandable reaction to be honest though after all of the stuff that happened at the last one.
replies.body_tagged: Wow that is a lot of teams disbanding.  2 within 2 hours of one another.  Did this last tournament make a lot of teams upset?  Understandable reaction to be honest though after all of the stuff that happened at the last one.

replies.body: lol if you werent in horizon horizon would probs be dead after t5

replies.body: Thanks for all LFT , Zic & Posi, i enjoyed a lot playing for Horizon
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for all LFT , Zic & Posi, i enjoyed a lot playing for Horizon

replies.body: I was just having fun subbing for scrims, didn't expect to be invited. Ty Zic and LFT, good fun :)
